LanguageData.FireControl.Connect.Desc: Choose a turret to connect to this fire control computer.
LanguageData.FireControl.MustBeSamePower: Turret must be connected to the same power network.
LanguageData.FireControl.MustBeYours: Turret must be in your faction.
LanguageData.FireControl.TooComplex: Computer does not have enough bandwidth.
LanguageData.FireControl.Disconnect.Desc: Choose a turret to disconnect from this fire control computer.
LanguageData.FireControl.AlreadyConnected: Turret is already connected to this fire control computer
LanguageData.FireControl.MustBeMine: Turret must be connected to this fire control computer
LanguageData.FireControl.Controllable.Desc: If true, turret will be controllable by fire control computers
LanguageData.FireControl.Restart.Desc: Your settings changes require a game restart to take effect. Sorry for the inconvenience.
LanguageData.FireControl.DisconnectAll.Desc: Disconnect all turrets connected to this fire control computer.
